author: huntingisland
content: I was told that the ETH2 deposit contract is on an indefinite hold because we are going to wait on IETF to standardize BLS signatures

author: huntingisland
content: Waiting on standards bodies = waiting on Godot, IMO

author: protolambda
content: Not indefinite, the BLS standardization working group is positive about progress: the draft is there, and they actively work to get it standardized. <@438324482306998273>

author: djrtwo
content: We are actually waiting on a "blockchain agreement" about the standard, which from my understanding is pretty much here. A handful of blockchains are going to commit to a standard soon before the final ietf, assuming that the ietf draft will be stable and that we at least get our own standard if the ietf one changes
